t: Amazon.com: Kas Rugs Area Rug, 5' x 7', Ivory
s: I then ordered the ivory (note: on other websites this brand has an ivory and a heathered ivory, the ivory listed here is actually the heathered Ivory, not a solid Ivory) it is a gorgeous rug, the absolute perfect neutral color, not so light that I'm worried about dirtying it, not quite beige. It's beautiful. I'll be ordering another one for my living room, I love it so much! ... We already had a KAS ...
